Sept. 28, 1963 D Seaham Colliery Contest
Seaham Colliery Contest 0 March & Own Choice Test Piece Contest
seaham-colliery-contest
None
March & Own Choice Test Piece Contest (Separate Points)
Vane Tempest Welfare Hall, Seaham Contest for B,C and D section bands. Best section C band - Shildon. Best section D band - Fishburn. 7 bands competed.
Jan. 18, 2017, 8:29 p.m. Jan. 18, 2017, 8:34 p.m.
1 Fishburn Band W. J. Makepeace
2 Dawdon Lodge Stan MacDonald
3 Shildon Town E. Bennett
4 Pelton Fell Workmen's D. Slaughter
